product_name: FuelBelt Slice Palm Holder Handheld Water Bottle - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Shaped so you can cradle it comfortably in your hand, this water bottle can be carried easily during your next long run or race. A handy zippered storage pocket holds your essentials.
